content:

And nearly lost track of a mysterious
Yokai artifact during the celebration.

content:

but I hope you and everyone else have a great time.
<color=#695c3a>It's so hot.</color>

content:
The more festive it gets,
The more dangerous it becomes.
That's why I don't celebrate holidays,

content:
Especially during events like the Summer Festival,

Still, I hope you have a wonderful time.
